page.title: 19Churches
page.content: for prayer and bible study meet weekly. 1984 - Weddings 2 Dedications 4 Funerals 4 Adult Baptisms 15 Attendances - 11am 120 6.30pm 65 Salvation Army Corps: Collections cover expenses.House to house collections are made for World Work.An annual Sale of Work is held.The Parish Church is used for burials. 1984 - Weddings 0 Funerals 2 Attendances - 11am 12 Hitcham:All Saints has 100 on Electoral Roll.The church has 1 elder.Hitcham holds an annual Fete, concerts and Stewardship Campaign.The gravestones are mostly flattened.The vestry and porch are being rebuilt at a cost of 16,000 pounds. 1984 - Weddings 2 Funerals 5 Attendance 8am 12,11am 37, 6.30pm 6
